name: C. Yaroslav and Sequence
statement:
Yaroslav has an array, consisting of integers. In a single operation
Yaroslav can change the sign of exactly elements in the array. In other
words, in one operation Yaroslav can select exactly array elements, and
multiply each of them by -1.Yaroslav is now wondering: what maximum sum
of array elements can be obtained if it is allowed to perform any number
of described operations?Help Yaroslav.
